item.title: Trump narrows Fed chair picks, January decision expected
item.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's term ends in May 2026, but President Trump plans to pick his replacement by January.

item.title: Further rate cuts in question as Fed policymakers deeply divided over December cut, minutes show
item.description: Federal Reserve policymakers were split on December's rate cut decision, with multiple dissents revealing disagreements over inflation and labor risks...

item.title: IRS hands workers bigger tax break for business expenses in 2026
item.description: Gig workers get a tax break with higher mileage rates for 2026. The IRS increased business driving deductions to 72.5 cents per mile from last year.

item.title: Trump calls Fed chair Powell a 'fool,' threatens lawsuit over headquarters renovation
item.description: Trump accuses Fed Chair Jerome Powell of "gross incompetence" and threatens lawsuit over costly headquarters renovation project in latest attack on ce...

item.title: Workers in 19 states get pay boost as minimum wages jump nationwide on New Year's Day
item.description: Major minimum wage increases take effect in 22 states during 2026, benefiting millions of American workers as wages rise above the federal $7.25 minim...
